result.arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ فَحَسۡبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
result.translation: Kuma idan an ce masa: "Ka ji tsõron Allah," sai girman kai da yin zunubi ya ɗauke shi To abin da yake mai isarsa Jahannama ce. Kuma haƙĩƙa, shimfiɗa tã munana.
